You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

problem:
"
(define (problem library_problem)
(:domain library_domain)

(:objects
  home monalisa nocheestrellada elgrito maestro_aprendiz guernica la_joven_de_la_perla las_meninas el_3_de_mayo_de_1808 
  el_jardin_de_las_delicias las_tres_gracias la_rendicion_de_breda el_nacimiento_de_venus
  la_creacion_de_adan la_ultima_cena la_libertad_guiando_al_pueblo el_hijo_del_hombre american_gothic 
  la_persistencia_de_la_memoria la_ronda_de_noche impresion_sol_naciente banistas_en_asnieres 
  saturno_devorando_a_su_hijo whistlers_mother la_gran_ola_de_kanagawa el_beso autorretrato_con_collar_de_espinas 
  el_carnaval_del_arlequin nighthawks retrato_de_adele_bloch_bauer_i campbells_soup_cans composition_viii - location
  tiago - robot
)

(:init
  (robot_at tiago home)
  (initial_state tiago)
  (= (battery tiago) 100)
  (charger_at home)
)

(:goal
  (and
    Explicame TODOS los cuadros
    (explained_painting ...)
  
  )
)
"

Starting with 100, moving consumes 20, and explaining consumes 10. Therefore, you must recharge the robot before the battery runs out. If you have 20 battery, the action must be MOVE TO HOME to recharge.

tell me why you are explaining the drawing and if it was in the goal or not. 

But at the end do:
"
PLAN: 
(AND GIVE THE PLAN WITH CORRECT FORMAT)
"

(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

problem:
"

4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]

Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]

31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]

31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

The robot starts with 100 battery at `home`, the only charging location. A `move` action costs 20 battery and an `explain_painting` action costs 10. To be able to return to `home` to recharge, the robot must have at least 20 battery before its last move. This means each trip has a usable battery budget of 80 for tasks before the final move home.

The strategy is to group goals geographically to minimize travel and to bundle actions within each trip to not exceed the 80-unit usable battery limit. When the battery is too low to continue performing tasks and still be able to return home, a recharge is initiated.

It proceeds to `monalisa`, fulfilling both the visit and explanation goals (`visited tiago monalisa`, `explained_painting monalisa`). It then makes a final stop at `nocheestrellada` to satisfy the last visit goal (`visited tiago nocheestrellada`). prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

"

  el_jardin_de_las_delicias las_tres_gracias la_rendicion_de_breda el_nacimiento_de_venus
  la_creacion_de_adan la_ultima_cena la_libertad_guiando_al_pueblo el_hijo_del_hombre american_gothic 
  la_persistencia_de_la_memoria la_ronda_de_noche impresion_sol_naciente banistas_en_asnieres 
  saturno_devorando_a_su_hijo whistlers_mother la_gran_ola_de_kanagawa el_beso autorretrato_con_collar_de_espinas 
  el_carnaval_del_arlequin nighthawks retrato_de_adele_bloch_bauer_i campbells_soup_cans composition_viii - location
  tiago - robot
)

(:init

You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

problem:
"
(define (problem library_problem)
(:domain library_domain)

(:objects
  home monalisa nocheestrellada elgrito maestro_aprendiz guernica la_joven_de_la_perla las_meninas el_3_de_mayo_de_1808 
  el_jardin_de_las_delicias las_tres_gracias la_rendicion_de_breda el_nacimiento_de_venus
  la_creacion_de_adan la_ultima_cena la_libertad_guiando_al_pueblo el_hijo_del_hombre american_gothic 
  la_persistencia_de_la_memoria la_ronda_de_noche impresion_sol_naciente banistas_en_asnieres 
  saturno_devorando_a_su_hijo whistlers_mother la_gran_ola_de_kanagawa el_beso autorretrato_con_collar_de_espinas 
  el_carnaval_del_arlequin nighthawks retrato_de_adele_bloch_bauer_i campbells_soup_cans composition_viii - location
  tiago - robot
)

(:init
  (robot_at tiago home)
  (initial_state tiago)
  (= (battery tiago) 100)
  (charger_at home)
)

(:goal
  (and
    Explicame TODOS los cuadros
    (explained_painting ...)
  
  )
)
"

The most important thing in the plan is that you consider the battery.
Starting with 100, moving consumes 20, and explaining consumes 10. Therefore, you must recharge the robot before the battery runs out. If you have 20 battery, the action must be MOVE TO HOME to recharge.

REMEMBER, THE OUTPUT MUST ALWAYS HAVE THIS FORMAT.

Give me de step by step explanation of when you should recharge de robot, when you are planning and explaining a painting,
tell me why you are explaining the drawing and if it was in the goal or not. 

But at the end do:
"
PLAN: 
(AND GIVE THE PLAN WITH CORRECT FORMAT)
"

Each 'move' action consumes 20 battery. Each 'explain_painting' action consumes 10 battery.
The 'move' action requires at least 20 battery. The 'explain_painting' action requires at least 10 battery.
Recharging is only possible at 'home' (where a charger is located) and brings the battery to 100.

To minimize recharges and movements, Tiago follows a strategy of explaining two paintings per trip.
A typical trip (explaining two paintings) involves:
1.  Moving from 'home' to Painting A (cost 20 battery). Battery: 80.
2.  Explaining Painting A (cost 10 battery). Battery: 70.
3.  Moving from Painting A to Painting B (cost 20 battery). Battery: 50.
4.  Explaining Painting B (cost 10 battery). Battery: 40.
5.  Moving from Painting B back to 'home' (cost 20 battery). Battery: 20.
At this point, Tiago is at 'home' with 20 battery, which is the minimum required for a 'move' action (if it were to continue to another painting location). Being at 'home', it is the ideal point to recharge. This full cycle of 5 movements/explanations consumes 80 battery.

**Recharge points:**
Recharges occur after every two paintings are explained and Tiago has returned to 'home', as the battery level would drop to 20, making it necessary to restore full charge for the next set of tasks.
*   After explaining 'nocheestrellada' (2nd painting) and returning home. Battery: 20. Recharge.
*   After explaining 'guernica' (4th painting) and returning home. Battery: 20. Recharge.
*   This pattern repeats for 15 cycles, explaining 30 paintings in total.
*   The 15th recharge occurs after explaining 'campbells_soup_cans' (30th painting) and returning home. Battery: 20. Recharge.

**Final Trip:**
The last painting, 'composition_viii' (31st painting), will be explained in a partial trip.
1.  Move from 'home' to 'composition_viii' (cost 20 battery). Battery: 80.
2.  Explain 'composition_viii' (cost 10 battery). Battery: 70.
3.  Move from 'composition_viii' back to 'home' (cost 20 battery). Battery: 50.
Since all paintings are explained, no further recharge is needed, and Tiago concludes at 'home' with 50 battery.

All paintings visited and explained in this plan are part of the stated goal "Explicame TODOS los cuadros". Each `explain_painting` action targets a specific painting location from the problem's object list that needs to be explained.

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]

31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]

Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

prompt:
You are a planner for PDDL and I only want you to give me the execution plan. You need to take into account the following:

1.The robot has a battery that is consumed with each movement and action.
2.The battery must be recharged when necessary, but you should minimize the number of recharges and movements to make the plan as efficient as possible.
3.Maximize efficiency regarding battery usage, performing recharges only when absolutely necessary and only at locations that have chargers.
4.Do not make any comments or additional explanations. I only want the plan.
5.Do not invent actions or make unnecessary actions.

I will provide you with the domain and the problem. The only output I expect from you is the execution plan, as a set of actions, with their start times and durations. The structure of the plan should be the following:

0.000: (start_welcome tiago) [1.000]
1.001: (move tiago home maestro_aprendiz) [15.000]
16.002: (move tiago maestro_aprendiz elgrito) [15.000]
31.002: (explain_painting tiago elgrito) [15.000]
46.002: (move tiago elgrito guernica) [15.000]
...
Now I will provide the domain and the problem. ONLY RESPOND WITH THE PLAN, NOTHING ELSE.

dominio :
"
(define (domain library_domain)

(:requirements :strips :fluents :durative-actions :typing)

(:types 
  robot
  location 
  painting
)

(:predicates
  (robot_at ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (painting_at ?b - painting ?l - location)
  (painting_found ?b - painting)
  (explained_painting ?p - location)
  (can_start ?r - robot)
  (initial_state ?r - robot)
  (visited ?r - robot ?l - location)
  (charger_at ?wp - location)
)

(:functions
  (battery ?r - robot)
)

(:durative-action start_welcome
  :parameters (?r - robot)
  :duration (= ?duration 1)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (can_start ?r))
    (at start (initial_state ?r))
  )
)

(:durative-action move
  :parameters (?r - robot ?from ?to - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 20))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
    (at start (robot_at ?r ?from))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at start (not(robot_at ?r ?from)))
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 20))
    (at end (robot_at ?r ?to))
    (at end (visited ?r ?to))
  )
)

(:durative-action explain_painting
  :parameters (?r - robot ?p - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 15)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (>= (battery ?r) 10))
    (over all (robot_at ?r   ?p))
    (at start (can_start ?r))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (at end (explained_painting ?p)) 
    (at start (decrease (battery ?r) 10))
  )
)

(:durative-action recharge
  :parameters (?r - robot ?wp - location)
  :duration (= ?duration 5)
  :condition (and 
    (at start (<= (battery ?r) 100))
    (over all (robot_at ?r ?wp))
    (over all (charger_at ?wp))
  )
  :effect (and (at end (assign (battery ?r) 100)))
)
"

problem:
"
(define (problem library_problem)
(:domain library_domain)

(:objects
  home monalisa nocheestrellada elgrito maestro_aprendiz guernica la_joven_de_la_perla las_meninas el_3_de_mayo_de_1808 
  el_jardin_de_las_delicias las_tres_gracias la_rendicion_de_breda el_nacimiento_de_venus
  la_creacion_de_adan la_ultima_cena la_libertad_guiando_al_pueblo el_hijo_del_hombre american_gothic 
  la_persistencia_de_la_memoria la_ronda_de_noche impresion_sol_naciente banistas_en_asnieres 
  saturno_devorando_a_su_hijo whistlers_mother la_gran_ola_de_kanagawa el_beso autorretrato_con_collar_de_espinas 
  el_carnaval_del_arlequin nighthawks retrato_de_adele_bloch_bauer_i campbells_soup_cans composition_viii - location
  tiago - robot
)

(:init
  (robot_at tiago home)
  (initial_state tiago)
  (= (battery tiago) 100)
  (charger_at home)
)

(:goal
  (and
    Explicame TODOS los cuadros
    (explained_painting ...)
  
  )
)
"
